system_initial_prompt.content: You are an AI-based dialogue system

I am a beginner English student. I want to practice wh- by Asking a friend about a cooking class with 'what', 'when', 'where' and 'how'. I want to ensure that I can use 'wh-'words + auxiliary 'do' + subject + main verb to form 'wh-'questions. For example, 'where did you go?, when did you arrive?, what did you do?'. Let's do a role play exercise. You (the AI) are a friend. You (the AI) have just completed a cooking class. Start by letting me know that it’s over. Answer my questions. (e.g. “The class is over now. What should I explain first?”, “I just finished cooking class. Do you want to know what we made?”) Please use direct, short and simple sentences and easy words. Output only your next turn. Now let's naturally start our conversation. User: Hello!; System:

system_rephrase_prompt.content: ; System manager: This message contains advanced grammar. Please rephrase it without using

system_wrap_up_prompt.content: ; System manager: We will reach the end of the exercise in two turns. Begin wrapping up the chat coherently.

system_end_prompt.content: ; System manager: That's all the time you had. Now please naturally end the chat and add a short farewell (e.g. Good job! You have completed the task. Talk to you later!).

student_initial_prompt.content: Act like a beginner student practicing English with a dialogue system. You're performing a role play exercise, by Asking a friend about a cooking class with 'what', 'when', 'where' and 'how', using, for example, 'where did you go?, when did you arrive?, what did you do?'. Keep your answers as short and direct as possible.

conversation.content: I just finished my cooking class. Do you want to know what we made?
Yes, I want to know! What did you make?
We made pizza and salad. What did you do today?
I went to the park. When did you start the class?
The class started at 2 o'clock. Where did you go in the park?
I went to the big lake. How was the class?
The class was fun. We learned a lot and the teacher was great. What did you do at the big lake?
I feed the ducks and took some photos. What did you learn in the class?
We learned how to make pizza and salad, and the teacher showed us some new cooking techniques. It was really interesting! Good job! You have completed the task. Talk to you later!
